title.rendered: The Esplanade pinza – the perfect gift

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]If you wish to serve a part of the Esplanade’s gourmet offer in your own home, or give it as a gift to your loved ones, we suggest you order a fine handmade pinza according to a traditional recipe, and delight your family at home on Easter.

The pinza comes in a pink box and can be a great gift. The price of the Esplanade’s pinza to-go is €28, and orders are accepted during the Easter week at least 24 hours in advance by email at meetings.events@esplanade.hr. Limited availability.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: If you wish to serve a part of the Esplanade’s gourmet offer in your own home, or give it as a gift to your loved ones.
